javadoc: SharedRangeMapDB provides a long value range map backed by a database table. This map allows values to share a given range with other values. @deprecated This map class should not be used except by the OldFunctionMapDB class

methods.name: <init>

params.name: name
params.comment:
map name used in naming the underlying database table.  
 This name must be unqiue across all shared range maps.

params.name: create
params.comment: if true the underlying database tables will be created.

methods.javadoc: Frees resources used by this map.
methods.name: dispose
methods.comment: Frees resources used by this map.

methods.name: add
methods.comment: Add a value to this map over the specified range.

params.name: value
params.comment: the value to associate with the range.

methods.javadoc:
Remove a value from this map.
@param value the value to remove.
methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Remove a value from this map.

methods.name: getValueIterator
methods.comment:
Get a LongField value iterator over the specified range.
 List is pre-calculated such that any changes made to the map
 after invoking this method will not be reflected by the iterator
 and invalid function keys may be returned.
 The implementation assumes a small set of values exist over the 
 range.

return.comment:
Iterator of unique LongField values occuring within the
 specified range.

methods.name: getValueRangeIterator
methods.comment: Get an index range iterator for a specified value.

params.name: value
params.comment: the value for which to iterator indexes over.

name: SharedRangeMapDB
comment:
SharedRangeMapDB provides a long value range map backed by a database table.
 This map allows values to share a given range with other values.
